message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds immense value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your business. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you that this product is worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you for a price that reflects its potential, but I also understand that value is subjective. Please consider this offer carefully, as I believe it could be mutually beneficial.  If you're interested, I'd be happy to schedule a call to discuss the details further.
